channel.title: Hallelujah, a mopar rendition
channel.description:
WELL I HEARD THERE WAS A SECRET BOT THAT SPELJOHAN MADE AND IT PLEASED THE NOOBS. BUT YOU DON'T REALLY CARE FOR PROGRAMMING DO YOU!? WELL IT GOES LIKE THIS VARAIABLES AND SYNTAX. THE MINOR BUG AND THE MAJOR ERROR. THE BAFFLED ADMIN, COMPOSING A HOW-TO MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
WELL YOUR PROGRAMMING WAS GOOD, BUT YOU NEEDED PROOF. YOU SAW A CHANCE ON THE JAVA THREAD. THEIR INTELLIGENCE AND WIT OVER THREW YAA! THEY TIED YOU TO THE JAVA CHAIR. THEY FLAMED YOU HARD AND THEY CUT YOUR HAIR AND FROM YOUR LIPS THEY DREW THE JAVA!!! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
BABY I'VE SEEN THIS CODE BEFORE YOU STOLE IT AND CLAIMED IT AS YOUR OWN. YOU KNOW, I RESPECTED YOU BEFORE I SAW IT. I'VE SEEN YOUR FLAMES ON THE JAVA THREAD YOUR POSTS AREN'T A VICTORY MARCH THEY ARE A BROKEN ENGLISH! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
THERE WAS A TIME, WHEN YOU TAUGHT ME HOW TO PROGRAM MOPARSCAPE SERVERS. BUT NOW YOU NEVER PROGRAM NOW DO YA!? BUT REMEMBER WHEN I SHOWED YOU HOW AND THE JAVA WAS MOVING IN YOU AND EVERY BREATH WE DREW WAS JAVA MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
MAYBE'S THEIR MOPARISTHEBEST ABOVE BUT ALL I EVER LEARNT FROM JAVA WAS HOW TO EDIT THE CLIENT.JAVA! IT'S NOT SOME NOOB YOU FLAME TONIGHT IT'S NOT SOME NOOB THAT YOU MAKE CRY IT'S A COLD AND HARD PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

item.title: Hallelujah, a mopar rendition
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Just about to post pokerface lyrics, stop being mean i am 12 years old and what is this?
M-m-m-more

I wanna program’em like they do in moparscape, please.
Client.java’em, flame’em raise it noob, program with me
Runescape game, intuition, play the game with dragon to start
And after the noobs been hooked, I’ll play the one with the account details

Oh, woah, oh, oh, oh, oh
I’ll get him hacked, show him what I got.
Oh, woah, oh, oh, oh, oh
I’ll get him hacked, show him what I got

[chorus]
Can’t read my, can’t read my, no he can’t read my client.java
(Programs like he’s a nobody)
[x2]
M-M-M-MOPAR FACE M-M-M-MOPAR FACE
M-m-m-more

I wanna troll with him, a hard pair we’ll be
A little trolling is fun when you’re with me
Moparscape trolling isn’t fun without a ban gun
And noobs when it’s trolling if it’s not rough, it isn’t fun (Right?)

Oh, woah, oh, oh, oh, oh
I’ll get him hacked, show him what I got.
Oh, woah, oh, oh, oh, oh
I’ll get him hacked, show him what I got.

[chorus]
Can’t read my, can’t read my, no he can’t read my client.java
(Programs like he’s a nobody)
[x2]
M-M-M-MOPAR FACE M-M-M-MOPAR FACE
M-m-m-more

I won’t tell you that I love you
Program or hack you, ‘cause i’m bluffing’
With my java, i’m not lyin’
I’m just stunnin with my programing skills gunning
Just like a noob in the tut forum
I’ll flame noobs, just to tore em
I promise this, promise this…
Check my Client.java cause I’m MARVELOUS

[chorus]
Can’t read my, can’t read my, no he can’t read my client.java
(Programs like he’s a nobody)
[x2]
M-M-M-MOPAR FACE M-M-M-MOPAR FACE
M-m-m-more
[repeat till end]

item.title: Hallelujah, a mopar rendition
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

WELL I HEARD THERE WAS A SECRET BOT
THAT SPELJOHAN MADE AND IT PLEASED THE NOOBS.
BUT YOU DON’T REALLY CARE FOR PROGRAMMING DO YOU!?
WELL IT GOES LIKE THIS VARAIABLES AND SYNTAX.
THE MINOR BUG AND THE MAJOR ERROR.
THE BAFFLED ADMIN, COMPOSING A HOW-TO
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

WELL YOUR PROGRAMMING WAS GOOD, BUT YOU NEEDED PROOF.
YOU SAW A CHANCE ON THE JAVA THREAD.
THEIR INTELLIGENCE AND WIT OVER THREW YAA!
THEY TIED YOU TO THE JAVA CHAIR.
THEY FLAMED YOU HARD AND THEY CUT YOUR HAIR
AND FROM YOUR LIPS THEY DREW THE JAVA!!!
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

BABY I’VE SEEN THIS CODE BEFORE
YOU STOLE IT AND CLAIMED IT AS YOUR OWN.
YOU KNOW, I RESPECTED YOU BEFORE I SAW IT.
I’VE SEEN YOUR FLAMES ON THE JAVA THREAD
YOUR POSTS AREN’T A VICTORY MARCH
THEY ARE A BROKEN ENGLISH!
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

THERE WAS A TIME, WHEN YOU TAUGHT ME
HOW TO PROGRAM MOPARSCAPE SERVERS.
BUT NOW YOU NEVER PROGRAM NOW DO YA!?
BUT REMEMBER WHEN I SHOWED YOU HOW
AND THE JAVA WAS MOVING IN YOU
AND EVERY BREATH WE DREW WAS JAVA
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

MAYBE’S THEIR MOPARISTHEBEST ABOVE
BUT ALL I EVER LEARNT FROM JAVA
WAS HOW TO EDIT THE CLIENT.JAVA!
IT’S NOT SOME NOOB YOU FLAME TONIGHT
IT’S NOT SOME NOOB THAT YOU MAKE CRY
IT’S A COLD AND HARD PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR

MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
MOPAR! MOPAR! MOPAR! MOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRR
